markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Twigjack Sack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1502)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 75</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sharp, flexible brambles poke from this sack made of intricately intertwined plant fibers. The sack's contents creak under the strain of the tightly compressed bundle. 

When thrown, a twigjack sack bursts open, spraying brambles in all directions that gouge and slash nearby creatures. A twigjack sack deals the listed piercing damage, [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and splash damage. Many types of twigjack sacks grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs=""
>
Twigjack Sack (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d6 piercing damage, 1 persistent bleed damage, and 1 piercing splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs=""
>
Twigjack Sack (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d6 piercing damage, 3 persistent bleed damage, and 2 piercing splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs=""
>
Twigjack Sack (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d6 piercing damage, 4 persistent bleed damage, and 3 piercing splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs=""
>
Twigjack Sack (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 4d6 piercing damage, 5 persistent bleed damage, and 4 piercing splash damage.
name: Twigjack Sack
